item.title: DISH
item.description: score:109 Chances: DISH Network Corp. is poised to benefit from its recent partnership with BrightLine to offer interactive ad units on SLING TV, tapping into the growing trend of performance-based advertising in the Connected TV (CTV) space. The approval of the merger between DISH Network and EchoStar by the FCC is a positive development, as it will allow the company to ease debt worries and compete more effectively with larger U.
